title: FF! Doc | FtpFileSystemListener
paragraphs: To avoid problems with duplicate filenames in folders like the errorFolder or processedFolder, you should configure either overwrite="true", configure numberOfBackups to a value larger than 0, or configure an inProcessFolder and fileTimeSensitive="true". These options can be used together as well.

In addition to the above, prior to release 9.0 it was not sufficient to configure inProcessFolder and fileTimeSensitive to avoid potential duplicate filename errors. Prior to release 9.0, it is recommended to configure numberOfBackups to avoid these issues.
This component has no required attributes
listItems: PEM Currently only used by the SignaturePipe to use a PEM certificate directly as a truststore.

FtpFileSystemListener
ListenersListenerFILE_SYSTEM
File listener for an FTP connection. listener that looks in a FileSystem for files. When a file is found, it is moved to an in-process folder, so that it isn't found more than once.
The information specified by messageType is then passed to the pipeline.

To avoid problems with duplicate filenames in folders like the errorFolder or processedFolder, you should configure either overwrite="true", configure numberOfBackups to a value larger than 0, or configure an inProcessFolder and fileTimeSensitive="true". These options can be used together as well.
